resources.textures

Interface Texture2D

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Resource, Texture
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EasyFiltering
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTexture, DynamicTexture, StaticTexture

    public interface Texture2D
extends Texture
    Interface for the standard 2D textures.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Texture2D.TextureWrapType2D
      Texture wrap type.
